test.name: Processo de compra de uma camiseta "Vira lata caramelo" no site do Chico Rei

kw.name: Clicar em "Concordar" no aviso sobre Cookies
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Pesquisar por "Vira lata caramelo" e selecionar a primeira opção da lista de resultados
Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Vira lata caramelo' into text field 'css=#header-search-input-desktop'.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Validar se o valor do produto é "R$ 69,99"
Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Selecionar tamanho, cor e clicar em comprar
Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.
